meanings.definition: To hit or strike someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He bonks the drum with his hands.
meanings.sent2: She bonks the nail into the wall with a hammer.
meanings.sent3: The clown bonks the balloon, making it pop.
meanings.sent4: The boxer bonks his opponent with a powerful punch.
meanings.sent5: The woodpecker bonks its beak against the tree trunk loudly.

meanings.definition: To have sexual intercourse with someone.
meanings.sent1: The birds bonk in the tree during mating season.
meanings.sent2: They bonk in the bedroom with the door closed.
meanings.sent3: The movie characters bonk in the romantic scene.
meanings.sent4: The animals bonk in the wild under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The couple bonks passionately in their secret hideaway.

meanings.definition: A sound made when hitting something.
meanings.sent1: The bonks of the hammer echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The bonks of the basketball hitting the court were loud.
meanings.sent3: The bonks of the drumsticks created a rhythmic beat.
meanings.sent4: The bonks of the falling objects startled the cat.
meanings.sent5: The bonks of the tennis ball against the wall were rhythmic.
